question: My father 71 year old. He had fracture in leg before 7 months and he is diabetics patient. Operation has done in fractured leg and put plate inside. but after operation his leg get paining and swelling. so that plate is removed and after removing plate there is wound still wet. Doctor saying there is dead piece of bone inside and there is nothing gangrine, the dead piece of bone will come out gradually. Will it possible?Please tell me what type of treatment should get?Please consult me.
title: Diabetes
